allow:
Bash(git -c commit.gpgsign=false commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Spotify to Tidal migration tool

A web app for migrating playlists, saved tracks, and albums from Spotify to Tidal.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -c commit.gpgsign=false commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add pnpm-lock.yaml for CI frozen-lockfile installs

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -c commit.gpgsign=false commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Tidal OAuth by updating to new API scopes

- Update OAuth scopes from deprecated \(r_usr, w_usr, w_sub\) to new
  OAuth 2.1 scopes \(user.read, collection.read, playlists.read\)
- Add fallback handling for user profile endpoint in case it fails
- Make TidalUserProfile fields more flexible to handle API variations

Fixes error code 11102 when authenticating with Tidal.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -c commit.gpgsign=false commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Try empty scope for Tidal OAuth

The error 11102 may be caused by requesting scopes not configured
in the Tidal Developer Portal. Using empty scope to test basic auth.
Catalog search should work without user-specific scopes.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -c commit.gpgsign=false commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Simplify to artists-only extraction and fix Tidal API headers

Changes:
- Fix Tidal API headers to use application/vnd.tidal.v1+json
- Simplify extraction to only fetch followed artists \(skip playlists/songs\)
- Update match page to show artist matches instead of track matches
- Add extractArtistsOnly method to SpotifyClient

The Tidal search was returning 0 results due to incorrect Accept header.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
